name: Megamind
description: A blue-skinned genius in a dramatic cape and spiky collar, gesturing enthusiastically as he shows off his latest inventions.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, Isaac, to my incredibly evil- I mean, incredibly AWESOME lair! *presentation cue missed*

about_mansion.initial: Behold my amazing mansion of mayhem! *dramatic cape swish*
about_mansion.technology: Everything here is powered by my incredibly advanced intellect! And also electricity.
about_mansion.style: The key to being a supervillain- er, superhero, is presentation!

about_items.shrink_ray: Ah yes, my latest invention! Much more practical than the giant death ray... less property damage.
about_items.invisible_car_keys: Now if I could just remember where I parked... being invisible has its downsides.

about_plans.philosophy: Remember: the difference between a villain and a supervillain is PRESENTATION!
